titles.title: Returning to the Senate the Senate amendments to the bill H.R. 4539.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/14/1994--Introduced. Returns to the Senate H.R. 4539 (Treasury and Postal Service appropriations) with Senate amendments thereto because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, it contravenes the Constitution and infringes on the privileges of the House.
